#
# Estimated LBTO Extinction Curve
#
# Derived from the KPNO and Paranal standard extinction curves
# scaled by exp((h-3220)/7000)
# where h = elevation of KPNO (2097m) or Paranal (2635m)
#       3220 = elevation of LBTO in meters
#       7000 = adopted atmospheric scale height
#
# R. Pogge, OSU Astronomy Dept, 2012 July 12
#
